subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Knicks guard Jeremy Lin is the first player from an Ivy League university to suit up for an N.B.A. team since the 2002-3 season.
snippet: The Knicks guard Jeremy Lin is the first player from an Ivy League university to suit up for an N.B.A. team since the 2002-3 season.
